summary: A neo-nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devotional priest.
cast: Ulrich Thomsen|Mads Mikkelsen|Nicolas Bro|Paprika Steen|Ali Kazim|Ole Thestrup|Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Gyrd Løfquist|Lars Ranthe|Peter Reichhardt|Tomas Villum Jensen|Peter Lambert|Solvej K. Christensen|Rasmus Rise|Jacob-Ole Remming|Emil Kevin Olsen|Per Holm Henriksen
title: Adams æbler
